Header: Will continue to take the country forward towards development â€“ President
Content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa says that they have to provide answers to challenges faced by the country more than working during a time when the country is being re-built following three decades of terrorism. The President points out that while facing these challenges which arose as a result of performing duties towards the nation; he will continue to take the country forward towards development. The President made these comments at a religious ceremony held in the Agalawatte Pathiraja Piriwen Raja Maha Viharaya on Friday. The President while reminding that the Buddhist clergy always stood by the nation whenever it faced challenges. said that they never failed to perform their duties that were required t. be performed towards the country.
